page.title: 07 The Village Pub
page.content: The Montagu Arms is the only pub in Barnwell. It has a crazy golf course and a caravan site at the back together with a playground. In the pub it has an open fire which is lit in the winter and they have a band that plays for them. The barman's name is Mike. I know Mr. and Mrs. Harley they are managing the pub while owners are abroad. The best selling drink is beer (71p per pint) and I sometimes go to the pub on Sundays with my parents, brother and sisters and have a drink and a packet of crisps. I like to play crazy golf which costs 130p but when you have finished you get your pound back. My favourite drink is lemonade called Panda Pop (15p) and a packet of crisps costs 12p.
